title: Rav Dov Kook's Mysterious Act
body: Tiveria mourns Rav Mordechai Yosef HaKohen's sudden passing on Simchas Torah. Meanwhile, Rav Dov Kook stops Hakafos in a mysterious event at his home.

title: Lev Tahor Flee to Honduras
body: Roughly ten families connected to the extremist Lev Tahor cult, under orders from their imprisoned leaders, fled the US to Honduras during Simchas Torah and Shemini Atzeres, regaining custody of their children in Guatemala.

title: Rav Tuvia Goldschmidt Passes
body: Rav Tuvia Goldschmidt zt”l, a distinguished rosh chaburah at Yeshivas Mir Yerushalayim, passed away at 67 after years of suffering. He was a dayan on the Beis Din of Yerushalayim.

title: US Jews Hide Religious Identity
body: Four in 10 Jewish Americans hide their religious identity, with 42% saying they don't display Jewish symbols. Almost a third, 31%, don't feel safe as Jews in the US, according to a Washington Post poll.
